I'm even more confused now and I guess this may be a local problem at my macBook.

* I removed all haml-gems and did bundle again
* The last example works now - even without an extra route. (https://github.com/iboard/rails_3_1_test)

* but [project revolve](http://github.com/iboard/revolve) still does render with :layout
  * and I can reproduce this at two different machines - see [this commit](https://github.com/iboard/revolve/commit/6d72a2beedcb845778b184a0f92bb4949a20e2ff)
  * revolve was build just as rails_3_1_test plus rails generate scaffold Message

I apologize here if I grabbed your time because of a (may be) local problem. 
Though both apps are using the same rvm-gemset, just to make sure, I'll build a new rvm-path and will try both apps from scratch.

If you're willing to spend even more time on this topic, check out [project revolve](http://github.com/iboard/revolve) and let me know if you can reproduce the error.
